testimonials.quote: The team at Skalp completely transformed my confidence. The results look incredibly natural and no one can tell it's SMP.
testimonials.author: James Mitchell

testimonials.quote: Best decision I ever made. The professionalism and attention to detail is outstanding. Highly recommend to anyone considering SMP.
testimonials.author: David Thompson

paragraphs: At Skalp Manchester, we specialize in the art and science of scalp micropigmentation. Our expert technicians have transformed thousands of lives through precision SMP treatments that create natural-looking hairlines and restore confidence.

Using the latest techniques and premium pigments, we deliver results that are indistinguishable from natural hair follicles. Every treatment is customized to match your skin tone, hair color, and desired hairline shape for the most authentic appearance possible.
about.callout: We believe everyone deserves to feel confident in their appearance. That's why we're committed to delivering exceptional results with every treatment.
about.imageAlt: Professional SMP technician at work in Manchester clinic

items.question: How long does scalp micropigmentation last?
items.answer: SMP typically lasts 3-5 years before requiring touch-ups. The longevity depends on factors like skin type, lifestyle, and sun exposure. We provide lifetime touch-up guarantees with our complete packages.

items.question: Is scalp micropigmentation painful?
items.answer: Most clients describe the sensation as mild discomfort, similar to getting a tattoo. We use topical numbing agents to minimize any discomfort. The procedure is well-tolerated by the vast majority of our clients.
